subject: Regarding International Shipping HS codes
description_text:
Hello, I'm Tharun from Sri Lanka. I want to buy some products from you.
[image: image.png]

But I want to calculate how much tax I would have to pay when clearing
customs in my country. To do that, I want to know the individual HS codes
of each item used for shipping these items.

Thank you

Best Regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Tharun Gunasena,      Hello, this is the corresponding HS Code: 9504508000.Â
